price: ឱម្ចាស់របស់ខ្ញុំ. ដូចេ្នះ សូមទ្រង់មេត្ដាកុំធ្វើឱ្យខ្ញុំស្ថិតក្នុង ចំណោមពួកដែលបំពានអី្វ។
arabic: رَبِّ فَلَا تَجۡعَلۡنِي فِي ٱلۡقَوۡمِ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: rabbi falā tajʿalnī fī al-qawmi al-ẓālimīna
